Sell.title: Sell a Blueprint
Sell.description: Share your expertise, help the community and generate passive income with your automations.

stripe.title: Setup Required
stripe.description: To sell on Koda, you must connect a Stripe account to receive your payments securely.

form.detailsDesc: Fill in the information below to publish your blueprint on the market.
form.title: Product Title
form.titleHelp: Give it a clear and catchy name.
form.priceHelp: Your net income will be calculated after commission.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe features, prerequisites, and the value proposition of your script...

s1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
s1.content: By accessing and using Koda (the "Platform"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Platform.

s2.title: 2. Description of Service
s2.content: Koda is a marketplace that allows users to sell and buy automation blueprints (workflows for n8n, Make, Zapier, etc.).

s3.title: 3. Sellers Obligations
s3.content: Sellers must ensure they have the rights to the blueprints they publish. Blueprints must be functional and correctly described.

s4.title: 4. Payments and Commissions
s4.content: Payments are processed via Stripe. Koda takes a commission on each sale as specified during the publication process.

s5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
s5.content: Unless otherwise specified, buyers receive a non-exclusive license to use the purchased blueprint for their own needs.

s1.title: 1. Data Collection
s1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us through Clerk (authentication) and Stripe (payments).

s2.title: 2. Use of Data
s2.content: Your data is used to manage your account, process transactions, and improve our services.

s3.title: 3. Data Sharing
s3.content: We do not sell your personal data. We share information only with our service providers (Clerk, Stripe) necessary for the operation of the Platform.

s4.title: 4. Cookies
s4.content: We use cookies to maintain your session and analyze the usage of the Platform.

contact.content: For any inquiries, you can contact us at [Your Email].
